thread.title: Man fatally shoots ex-wife, commits suicide at KL law firm
thread.title_full: Man fatally shoots ex-wife, commits suicide at KL law firm

title: Man fatally shoots ex-wife, commits suicide at KL law firm
text:
A man is believed to have shot dead his ex-wife, before shooting himself at a law firm in Menara Centara, Kuala Lumpur, this afternoon. 
Dang Wangi district deputy police chief Habibi Majinji said police were alerted about the incident around 3pm. 
“Preliminary investigations showed that a shooting incident took place at the 16th floor, involving a man and a woman. 
“Further investigations are being done to establish the motive behind the killings,” Habibi was quoted as saying by NST Online . 
Meanwhile, Kuala Lumpur CID chief Rusdi Mohd Isa said the 51-year-old suspect also had a parang when he went to his 46-year-old ex-wife's office. 
"An altercation broke out between them before the suspect fired four shots. 
"Two gunshots hit the back and the left thigh of the victim before the man shot himself in the head," he was quoted as saying by Harian Metro . 
Based on preliminary investigations, the man and his wife, who have three children, were divorced five years ago. 
"The case is investigated under Section 302 of the Penal Code for murder," he said, adding that police are still investigating the motive.
